features.title: Powerful Features for <Typography>Multi-Account Management</Typography>
features.subTitle: Everything you need to manage, automate, and scale your online presence across multiple platforms securely.
features.antiDetectDesc: Fake browser parameters, bypass multi-account detection systems on platforms (Facebook, Google, TikTok, Telegram, Zalo, Shopee, Amazon...), easily fake IP using proxy.

features.automationDesc: Create workflows by dragging and dropping, no coding required. Schedule automated runs with diverse processes like account registration, nurturing, airdrop farming.
features.synchronizationDesc: Easily perform synchronized actions simultaneously across multiple profiles for maximum efficiency.
features.miniAppDesc: Centralized hub for automated processes. Publish your automated processes to the market to earn fees.
features.teamworkDesc: Workspace feature, share profiles by granting permissions per profile or per profile group for seamless collaboration.
features.affiliateDesc: Share referral links, track sign-ups & revenue, receive automated commissions for growing the community.
